fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Event Attendance by Quarter
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to group data by quarter and visualize attendance patterns over time.

InputDefinition.userMessage: What are our event attendance trends by quarter for the last 2 years? Show it as a chart. I want to be able to click on a quarter to see which events happened and their attendance.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a chart showing attendance by quarter
Quarters are properly calculated and labeled (Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4)
Visualization shows seasonal patterns if they exist
Chart supports drill-down to show event list with attendance for selected quarter
Event table allows opening individual event records
